title: Artificial Intelligence: Generative AI, Cloud and MLOps (Online)
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: This course covers the advanced topics of generative AI, cloud computing, and MLOps. It is designed for intermediate learners looking to deepen their understanding of AI technologies and their practical applications.

title: Oxford Artificial Intelligence Programme
description: This programme is designed for managers, business leaders, and technical professionals to understand AI mechanics, its potential, and challenges. It provides a comprehensive understanding of AI and machine learning.

title: Technology and AI: Online Courses
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: These online courses offer flexible learning options covering various aspects of AI and technology. They are designed for professionals and those with prior knowledge of AI.
